segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, completely absorbed in her task, drying a plate as if that’s all that matters in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the water pouring over onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but still, she just continues her meticulous polishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for the mess to catch her attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she focuses on that plate is almost mesmerizing, yet slightly concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy on the stool looks so determined, but I can't help but feel anxious for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching into that cookie jar like it’s the most important mission ever, blissfully unaware of the danger beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR
